Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with short straight-walled bottleneck, narrow mouth, straight rim and unstable base. Paste of a reddish colour and surface partially covered with an orangey-coloured coating. The upper third of the body presents a painted decoration in red, demarcated in black by zoomorphic (crowned asp) and vegetal (stylized lotus) designs.
